**Tender Announcement**

**Title (English/French)**: 
  - [CT114 Tutor - Ring]
  - [Anneau]

**Reference Number (Number of Reference)**:
* CB-207-15435645

**Solicitation Number (Number of Sollicitation)**:
* W8485-248094/A

**Publication Date/Date de Publication:**
* February 7, 2024
**Tender Closing Date/Appel Offres Date Cloture:**
* February 23, 2024, at 14:00:00

**Annex of Intend to Continue Seasonal Program (N.B.)**: 
The Department of National Defence hereby invites the qualified Supply Arrangement holders of W8485-184741 series to submit proposals for Supply Arrangement – W8485-248094/A for the purchase of components for the CT114 Tutor.

**Request for Proposal (RFP)**: The following companies have been invited to submit a proposal:
- Aero Precision Industries LLC
- Aero Technical Components Inc.
- JHT
- Patlon Aircraft & Industries Limited
- Simex Defence Inc.
- Unisource Technology
- M1 Composites Technology
- Honeywell
- Tower Aerospace
- Canada West Avionics

**Contact Information:**
**Procurement Office:**

 Department of National Defence
Supply Arrangement – W8485-184741 Series

Aerospace Equipment Program Management (DGAEPM)
Department of National Defence (DND) / Government of Canada
455, Boulvard de la carrière, Gatineau (QC) J8Y 6V7
Ryan.Duncan@forces.gc.ca
Phone: (613) 292-9650
